prompts: Create a mysterious Pokemon that resembles a letter with a black and white color scheme.
Imagine a unique Pokemon that can only be found in ancient ruins, shaped like a symbol.
Generate a ghostly Pokemon with an enigmatic aura, featuring circular patterns and dark colors.
Design a Pokemon that represents knowledge and secrets, with a minimalist style and simple shapes.
Show me a Pokemon made entirely of shadows, with a focus on its eye-catching central design.
Make a surreal Pokemon that embodies the concept of communication through symbols and letters.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a letter from the alphabet, blending into its surroundings.
